title: My Lol.Launcher.Exe and Lol.launcher.admin.exe is gone.
body:
Yeah, I did something stupid that I wont do again. But I wanted to download map skins for Summoners rift and when i did that, it worked fine. But I got greedy and downloaded this "Snow" textured map that when I launch league, it crashes my league and says I need reinstall league. 

I did that but now it says I need my lol.launcher.exe or admin.exe but they are missing from my Riot games foldier. So I reinstalled the software holding the map skins or league itself again but they are still missing. I even used Hextech repair tool but that didnt help either. So im left leaving myself here to the community...

Like i said, I did stupid things and I need help gaining my lol.launcher.exe back if anyone knows a way to get them back or where they are?

replies.body: Yeeeaaaaa it's never good to use third-party apps since you're never sure what they actually are. At this point, I'd suggest using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with reinstall AND clean uninstall. After that, you should be able to launch the client with LeagueClient.exe.
I've done that and the Tool said that everything is fine but my Launcher is still completely missing.
LoL Launcher hasn't been used for quite a while now. use LeagueClient.exe

My client doesn't work at all... it wont even open, the league of legends logo appears, the processes start up on task manager, but they end a few moments later, and it just wont open, could it be a Windows 10 issue? (it's up to date, as are all of my pc drivers)
It's not likely just windows 10, if it is at all (I use win 10). I'd do what broporo said above.
